page.title: 08Two Elton Houses
page.content: "Ivy Cottage" is a small terraced gritstone cottage situated in the centre of Elton surrounded by other houses. It is a grade 2 listed build- ind at least 200 years old which has been modernised. There are only four rooms. The living room has exposed beams, a stone fireplace, an open staircase and painted walls. There is one bedroom, a small bathroom and a built-on kitchen. The windows have stone mullions. The walls are thick rubble with a chemical damp course and there is a small yard. "Meadowfields" is a detached four- bedroomed house built in 1977 and situated on the outskirts of Elton. It has solid fuel central-heating, double glazing, a well-equipped fitted kitchen, a garage and gardens. It is gritstone-faced to comply with Peak Park Planning Board regulations.
